definitions.text: the physical property of being inflexible and hard to bend
the property of moving with pain or difficulty
examples: he awoke with a painful stiffness in his neck

definitions.text: firm resoluteness in purpose or opinion or action
examples: a charming host without any touch of stiffness or pomposity

definitions.text: the inelegance of someone stiff and unrelaxed (as by embarrassment)

examples: the harshness of his punishment was inhuman
